channel.title: Is it possible to count comma separated values?
channel.description:
Hi, is it possible to count comma separated values? for example I have this query | id | col1 | |----|------------| | 1 | val1, val3 | | 2 | val3 | | 3 | val2,val3 |
I want to have this result | col1 | count(col1) | |------|-------------| | val1 | 1 | | val2 | 1 | | val3 | 3 |
Also which SQL syntax should I reference when using redash?

item.title: Is it possible to count comma separated values?
item.dc:creator: johnthor
item.description:
Hi, is it possible to count comma separated values? for example I have this query

id col1
1 val1, val3
2 val3
3 val2,val3

I want to have this result

col1 count(col1)
val1 1
val2 1
val3 3

Also which SQL syntax should I reference when using redash?

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to count comma separated values?
